overview: The final signal from Bill Ewaskoâ€™s cell phone was received on June 27, 2010. After that, nothing was ever heard from him again. Ewasko had disappeared three days earlier while hiking in Joshua Tree National Park in the US. Long after the police and his family gave up the search, armchair detectives and fellow hikers are still trying to find answers. Online, every possible theory is examined; offline, every path is explored.
title: Labyrinth
